word.description: {芒果} is the [loanword](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Loanword) for [mango](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mango) (which is taken from the Portuguese *manga* which is from the Malay *mangga* which in turn came from the Tamil *mankay*), and {綠茶} is [green tea](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Green_tea), so 芒果綠茶 is *mango green tea*.

word.Yale: mōng gwó baak hēung luhk chàh
word.Pinyin: máng guǒ bǎi xiāng lǜ chá
word.description: {芒果} is the [loanword](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Loanword) for [mango](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mango) (which is taken from the Portuguese *manga* which is from the Malay *mangga* which in turn came from the Tamil *mankay*). 百香 is short for [passion fruit](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Passion_fruit_(fruit)) ({百香果, *hundred fragrant fruit*). And {綠茶} is [green tea](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Green_tea), so 芒果百香綠茶 is *mango hundred fragrant fruit green tea*.

description: Green tea mixed with mango and passion fruit.

word.Yale: mōng gwó láuh cháang luhk chàh
word.Pinyin: máng guǒ liǔ chéng lǜ chá
word.description: {芒果} is the [loanword](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Loanword) for [mango](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mango) (which is taken from the Portuguese *manga* which is from the Malay *mangga* which in turn came from the Tamil *mankay*), {柳橙} is *orange* (in Taiwan, literally *willow orange*), and {綠茶} is [green tea](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Green_tea), so 芒果綠茶 is *mango orange green tea*.

description: Green tea mixed with mango and orange.

word.description: {草莓} is a [strawberry](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Strawberry) ({草} is *straw* and {莓} is *berry*), and {綠茶} is [green tea](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Green_tea). So 草莓綠茶 is *strawberry green tea*.

images.place: Meet Fresh, South Salt Lake, Utah

word.Yale: chóu múi baak hēung luhk chàh
word.Pinyin: cǎo méi bǎi xiāng lǜ chá
word.description: {草莓} is a [strawberry](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Strawberry) ({草} is *straw* and {莓} is *berry*), 百香 is short for [passion fruit](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Passion_fruit_(fruit)) ({百香果, *hundred fragrant fruit*), and {綠茶} is [green tea](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Green_tea). So 草莓百香綠茶 is *strawberry hundred fragrant green tea*.

images.place: Meet Fresh, South Salt Lake, Utah

description: Green tea mixed with strawberry and passion fruit.

word.description: 百香 is short for [passion fruit](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Passion_fruit_(fruit)) ({百香果, *hundred fragrant fruit*). {綠茶} is [green tea](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Green_tea), so 百香綠茶 is *hundred fragrant green tea*.

word.Yale: cháang jí baak hēung luhk chàh
word.Pinyin: chéng zi bǎi xiāng lǜ chá
word.description: {橙子} is the Mandarin word for *orange*, and 百香 is short for [passion fruit](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Passion_fruit_(fruit)) ({百香果, *hundred fragrant fruit*). {綠茶} is [green tea](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Green_tea), so 百香綠茶 is *orange hundred fragrant green tea*.

description: Green tea mixed with [passion fruit](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Passion_fruit_(fruit)) and orange.

word.Yale: chóu múi láuh cháang luhk chàh
word.Pinyin: cǎo méi liǔ chéng lǜ chá
word.description: {草莓} is a [strawberry](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Strawberry) ({草} is *straw* and {莓} is *berry*), {柳橙} is *orange* (in Taiwan, literally *willow orange*), and {綠茶} is [green tea](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Green_tea), so 草莓綠茶 is *strawberry green tea*.

images.place: Meet Fresh, South Salt Lake, Utah

description: Green tea mixed with strawberry and orange.
